mapper.select: SELECT u.ac_idx, u.nickname, u.img, u.category_idx, CASE WHEN f_reverse.followed_ac_idx IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS followedByCurrentUser FROM follows f JOIN userAccount u ON u.ac_idx = f.follower_ac_idx LEFT JOIN follows f_reverse ON f_reverse.follower_ac_idx = f.followed_ac_idx AND f_reverse.followed_ac_idx = f.follower_ac_idx WHERE f.followed_ac_idx = #{acIdx}
SELECT u.ac_idx, u.nickname, u.img, u.category_idx, 1 AS followedByCurrentUser FROM follows f JOIN userAccount u ON u.ac_idx = f.followed_ac_idx WHERE f.follower_ac_idx = #{acIdx}
